description.english: CQC Slam a guard and knock him out

description.spanish: Derriba a un guarda usando técnicas CAC y noquéalo.

displayName.english: Tell Me Where the Bomb Is

displayName.spanish: Que no te tiemble el pulso

displayName.tchinese: 山貓絕不會讓獵物逃走
displayName.japanese: 山猫は獲物を逃さない

description.english: Spot Ocelot in the background when Snake is shaking the President's hand
description.german: Ocelot im Hintergrund entdecken, wenn Snake dem Präsidenten die Hand schüttelt.
description.french: Repérer Ocelot en arrière-plan lorsque Snake serre la main du Président.
description.italian: Individua Ocelot sullo sfondo quando Snake stringe la mano del presidente.
description.koreana: 스네이크가 대통령과 악수하려는 장면에서 뒤에 있는 오셀롯을 발견한다
description.spanish: Localiza a Ocelot a lo lejos mientras Snake le da la mano al presidente
description.schinese: 斯内克要和总统握手时，发现其身后的山猫
description.tchinese: 在Snake跟總統握手的場面，發現到後方的Ocelot
description.russian: Найдите Оцелота на заднем плане, когда Снейк пожимает руку президенту.

description.brazilian: Aviste Ocelot no fundo enquanto Snake aperta a mão do presidente.

description.japanese: 動物を生け捕りにする
description.brazilian: Capture qualquer animal vivo.

description.english: Eat a snake of any type
description.german: Eine beliebige Art von Schlange verspeisen.

displayName.tchinese: 邁向食物收藏家的道路
displayName.japanese: フード・コレクターへの道

description.english: Record any food item into your Food Collection

description.french: Ajouter une denrée alimentaire à votre collection alimentaire.
description.italian: Registra un oggetto commestibile nel catalogo cibo.
description.koreana: 음식 컬렉션에 종류에 상관없이 식량을 등록한다

displayName.english: A Good Man Is Hard to Find

displayName.spanish: Un hombre bueno es difícil de encontrar
displayName.japanese: カムフラージュ・マスター
displayName.brazilian: Homem Bom é Difícil de Encontrar

description.english: Achieve a Camo Index of 100%
description.french: Atteindre un pourcentage de camouflage de 100 %.

description.german: Einen Tarnindex von mehr als 90 % erreichen.

description.brazilian: Consiga um Índice de Camuflagem de 90% ou mais.

description.english: Create the Ocelot Time Paradox
description.italian: Crea il paradosso temporale di Ocelot.
description.spanish: Crea la paradoja temporal de Ocelot

description.japanese: オセロット・タイム・パラドックスを発生させる
description.brazilian: Crie um Paradoxo Temporal com o Ocelot.

description.english: Throw a poisonous creature at an enemy
description.german: Wirf eine giftige Kreatur auf einen Feind.
description.french: Projeter une créature venimeuse sur un ennemi.
description.italian: Lancia una creatura velenosa contro un nemico.
description.spanish: Lanza una criatura venenosa a un enemigo
description.schinese: 把带有毒性的生物扔向敌人
description.tchinese: 將帶有毒性的生物投向敵人
description.japanese: 毒のある生物を敵へ投げつける
description.brazilian: Arremesse uma criatura venenosa em um inimigo.

description.english: Listen to Para-Medic talk about movies after you save
description.german: Para-Medics Gedanken über Filme nach dem Speichern zuhören.
description.french: Écouter Para-Medic parler de films après avoir sauvegardé.
description.italian: Ascolta i commenti di Para-Medic sul cinema dopo aver salvato.
description.koreana: 무전으로 저장한 뒤 패러메딕으로부터 영화에 관한 이야기를 듣는다
description.spanish: Escucha a Para-Medic hablar de películas después de guardar
description.schinese: 对无线对讲机的内容进行保存后，听帕拉·梅迪奇聊电影
description.tchinese: 透過無線電保存後，與Para-Medic暢談關於電影的話題
description.russian: После сохранения послушайте рассказ Парамедика о фильмах.
description.japanese: 無線でセーブした後に、パラメディックから映画についての話を聞く
description.brazilian: Ouça a Para-Medic falar sobre filmes depois de salvar.

description.english: Call in fire support
description.italian: Richiedi fuoco di appoggio.
description.spanish: Pide fuego de apoyo
description.tchinese: 進行火力支援請求
description.japanese: 火力支援要請を行う
description.brazilian: Solicite apoio da artilharia.

displayName.french: Ça fait du bien par où ça passe
displayName.japanese: ヒーリング・ミュージック

description.english: Call one Healing Radio frequency
description.italian: Chiama una frequenza radio per curarti.
description.koreana: 무전으로 종류에 상관없이 힐링 라디오를 듣는다
description.spanish: Llama a una frecuencia de radio curativa
description.schinese: 通过无线对讲机听一首治愈音乐
description.tchinese: 透過無線電收聽任一個音樂節目
description.japanese: 無線でいずれかのヒーリングラジオを聞く
description.brazilian: Ligue para uma frequência de Rádio Curativa.

description.english: Use bees to harass an enemy
description.french: Utiliser les abeilles pour attaquer un ennemi.
description.italian: Usa le api per infastidire un nemico.
description.spanish: Usa las abejas para acosar al enemigo
description.tchinese: 使用蜜蜂攻擊敵人
description.japanese: 蜂を使って敵を攻撃する
description.brazilian: Faça abelhas atacarem um inimigo.

description.english: Blow up an armory or provisions storehouse with TNT
description.german: Eine Waffenkammer oder ein Vorratslager mit TNT in die Luft sprengen.
description.french: Faire exploser une armurerie ou un entrepôt de stockage avec du TNT.
description.italian: Fai esplodere un arsenale o un deposito di rifornimenti con il TNT.
description.koreana: TNT로 무기고 또는 식량 창고를 폭파한다
description.spanish: Haz volar por los aires una armería o un almacén con explosivos
description.schinese: 使用TNT炸毁兵器库或食物仓库
description.tchinese: 使用TNT爆破武器庫或糧食庫
description.russian: Взорвите оружейный или продовольственный склад с помощью ТНТ.
description.japanese: TNTで武器庫か食糧庫を爆破する
description.brazilian: Exploda um arsenal ou depósito de mantimentos com TNT.

description.english: Use the Fake Death pill
description.french: Utiliser la pilule de mort simulée.
description.italian: Usa la pillola di morte apparente.
description.spanish: Usa la pastilla de la muerte falsa
description.tchinese: 使用假死藥
description.japanese: 仮死薬を使う
description.brazilian: Use a Pílula de Falsa Morte.

description.english: Sneak up on The End and hold him up to make him drop an item
description.german: An The End heranschleichen und ihn überfallen.
description.french: Approcher The End furtivement et le maîtriser pour qu'il relâche un objet.
description.italian: Sorprendi alle spalle The End e immobilizzalo e fargli cadere degli oggetti.
description.koreana: 디 엔드에게 몰래 다가가서 홀드 업으로 아이템을 드롭시킨다
description.spanish: Pilla por sorpresa a The End e inmovilizalo para que deje caer un objeto.
description.schinese: 偷偷靠近“死亡”，使用“制伏”使其掉落道具
description.tchinese: 潛伏近身並以槍口控制使The End掉落道具
description.russian: Подкрадитесь к Концу и сделайте захват, чтобы он выронил предмет.
description.japanese: ジ・エンドに忍び寄り、ホールドアップでアイテムをドロップさせる
description.brazilian: Aproxime-se do The End furtivamente e renda-o para que um item caia.

description.english: Kill The End before the boss battle
description.german: The End schon vor dem Boss-Kampf töten.
description.french: Tuer The End avant la bataille finale.
description.italian: Elimina The End prima di affrontarlo in battaglia.
description.spanish: Mata a The End antes de que comience el combate real
description.tchinese: 沒經過戰鬥就打倒了The End
description.russian: Убейте Конца до финальной битвы с ним.
description.japanese: 戦うことなくジ・エンドを倒す
description.brazilian: Mate o The End antes de lutar contra ele.

displayName.japanese: マッドサイエンティスト

description.english: Get dirty while wearing the Scientist uniform
description.german: Beim Tragen des Outfits des Wissenschaftlers schmutzig werden.

description.italian: Sporcati mentre indossi l'uniforme da scienziato.

description.schinese: 穿着“科学家的衣服”时弄脏自己

description.brazilian: Suje-se enquanto usa o disfarce de cientista.

description.english: Parry all of The Boss's CQC attacks

description.english: Clear the game on any difficulty

description.english: Achieve a 100% for your Food Collection
description.german: Erreichen Sie unter EXTRAS 100 % für Ihre Nahrungssammlung.

description.japanese: EXTRASのフードコレクションを100%にする

description.english: Obtain every camouflage uniform and face paint
description.german: Erlangen Sie alle Tarnungen und Gesichtsbemalungen.
description.french: Obtenez toutes les tenues de camouflage et les peintures pour visage.

description.tchinese: 獲得所有的偽裝・臉部塗妝
